name: TREVORBALL
description:
This game has no goal. I don't really know what this game is or could be but here it is, try get a good distance (the number at the top).

Left and right swing the bat. Both directions or space to shoot. P restarts.

F10 + space gets you in  the debug display, F10 + , or F10 + . speed up or slow down time from there.

Graphics partially created by Twitter.
